CadBerry folder¶

CadBerry folder containing most of the editor’s source code. Most of CadBerry’s rendering and window code are based on The Hazel Game Engine by The Cherno. This will probably change as CadBerry gets more built out and more features are added.

Contents:

  • CadBerry/BuildEngine
  • CadBerry/Events
  • CadBerry/ImGui
  • CadBerry/Module
  • CadBerry/Platform
  • CadBerry/Project
  • CadBerry/Rendering
  • CadBerry/Tests
  • CadBerry/Threading
  • CadBerry/Utils
  • CadBerry/Application.h
  • CadBerry/Core.h
  • CadBerry/Input.h
  • CadBerry/KeyCode.h
  • CadBerry/Layer.h
  • CadBerry/LayerStack.h
  • CadBerry/Log.h
  • CadBerry/Math.h
  • CadBerry/MouseCode.h
  • CadBerry/Window.h
